event.descr: The following Weblogic Server has started: %parm[#2]% at the following time: %parm[#1]%
The following Weblogic Server has shutdown: %parm[#2]% at the following time: %parm[#1]%

event.event-label: BEA Weblogic Attribute Change Received Event
event.descr:
An attribute has changed:
Time: %parm[#1]%
Server: %parm[#2]%
ChangeType: %parm[#3]%
New Value: %parm[#4]%
Old Value: %parm[#5]%
Mbean Type: %parm[#6]%
MBean Name: %parm[#7]%
Attribute Name: %parm[#8]%
Attribute Type: %parm[#9]%
event.logmsg:
BEA Event: Attribute Change on %parm[#2]%:
%parm[#7]%.%parm[#8]% changed to %parm[#4]%

event.event-label: BEA Weblogic Monitor Trap Received Event
event.descr:
A Weblogic Monitor Trap has been triggered:
Time: %parm[#1]%
Server: %parm[#2]%
Monitor Type: %parm[#3]%
Monitor Threshold: %parm[#4]%
Monitor Value: %parm[#5]%
MBean Type: %parm[#6]%
MBean Name: %parm[#7]%
Attribute Name: %parm[#8]%
event.logmsg:
BEA Event: A %parm[#3]% Monitor Trap has been triggered on %parm[#2]%.
MBean Type: %parm[#6]% Attribute Name: %parm[#8]%

event.event-label: BEA Weblogic Log Filter Trap Received Event
event.descr:
A Weblogic Log Filter has been triggered:
Time: %parm[#1]%
Server: %parm[#2]%
Machine Name: %parm[#3]%
Thread ID: %parm[#4]%
Transaction ID: %parm[#5]%
User ID: %parm[#6]%
SubSystem: %parm[#7]%
Message ID: %parm[#8]%
Severity: %parm[#9]%
Log Message: %parm[#10]%
event.logmsg: BEA Event: A Log Filter Trap has been triggered.
